KarobarCompany
//APP INTRO Receive order on your phone Get your order without visiting every other distributor. Just wait for the order to be placed by the distributor and you are good to go
Manage your workers With one click you can add and authorize any worker within the company who will be responsible for managing the delivery process of orders
Showcase your products Make a gallery of the products you will be delivering so the distributors can see what products you are actually supplying Email Karobar Email address
